alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 16 at 7:16AM EST until February 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Bath, Elliott, Fleming, Montgomery and Rowan. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread showers will affect the area today into tonight, with times of thunderstorms also expected. Heavy rainfall will likely result, bringing significant rises on area creeks and streams. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
